<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instant Opening](/Feats.aspx?ID=588) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 188 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 18)

</column>

---

You distract your opponent with a few choice words or a rude gesture. Choose a target within 30 feet. It’s flat-footed against your attacks until the end of your next turn. Depending on the way you describe your distraction, this action gains either the auditory or visual trait.
name: Instant Opening
